name: freeCGI++
short_description: freecgi++ is an ANSI C++-compliant hierarchy for developing object-oriented CGI applications. It supports FORMS, cookies, multi-part submissions, basic cryptography, HTML output, custom HTTP headers, etc. and includes full documentation, help, a tutorial

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
